# Environment

```{r}
library(mgcv)
library(ggplot2)
library(mgcViz)
```

```{r}
ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index,hosp_mortality) ) +
  stat_smooth()

ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index,totalFluid_72) ) +
  stat_smooth()
```

# GAM analysis Fluid Balance

```{r}
# Build the model
model <- gam(totalFluid_72 ~ 
                leaking_index
                + age_fixed
                + gender
                + charlson_score
                ,data=selected_df_fluid)
# Make predictions
predictions <- model %>% predict(selected_df_fluid)

summary(model)
# Model performance
data.frame(
  RMSE = RMSE(predictions, selected_df_fluid$totalFluid_72),
  R2 = R2(predictions, selected_df_fluid$totalFluid_72)
)

ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index, totalFluid_72) ) +
  stat_smooth(method = gam, formula = y ~ s(x)) +
  ggtitle("GAM Model for Leaking Index and Fluid Balance 72hrs") +
  labs(y="Fluid Balance 72hrs", x = "Leaking Index")
```

```{r}
# Build the model
model <- gam(hosp_mortality ~ 
                q_leaking_index
                +totalFluid
                + age_fixed
                + gender
                + charlson_score
                ,data=selected_df_fluid)
# Make predictions
predictions <- model %>% predict(selected_df_fluid)

summary(model)
# Model performance
data.frame(
  RMSE = RMSE(predictions, selected_df_fluid$hosp_mortality),
  R2 = R2(predictions, selected_df_fluid$hosp_mortality)
)

ggplot(selected_df_fluid, aes(leaking_index, hosp_mortality) ) +
  stat_smooth(method = gam, formula = y ~ s(x)) +
  ggtitle("GAM Model for Leaking Index and Hospital Mortality") +
  labs(y="Hospital Mortality", x = "Leaking Index")
```
